Actions.Name: Stalk Prey
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked, at the end of that foe's turn, the [name] can remove itself from the battlefield, then return in any adjacent space to them. If the marked foe is not adjacent to any allies, the [name] deals 6 damage to them, then gains stealth.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Description: Foes in the area take 2 damage. The [name] may dash to any space in the area after this action resolves, with phasing.
